name: Eyes In The Sky 3-Piece Kit of Full Sizes
about: What it is:A full-size kit with two eye-patch favorites for visible brightening and hydrating, plus new patches that smooth the look of lines and are only available here..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity.Highlighted Ingredients:- 24K Gold: Firms and brightens the look of skin..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance..What Else You Need to Know:This set includes 24K Gold Hydra-Gel Eye Patches to help firm and brighten the look of the eye area, Water Drench Hydra-Gel Eye Patches to hydrate skin with a liquid cloud of moisture, and new Peptide Skinjection Hydra-Gel Patches that smooth the look of linesu2014an upcoming launch available for preview only in this kit..This Set Contains:- 30 Pairs (60 patches) 24K Gold Pure Luxury Lift & Firm Hydra-Gel Eye Patches
ingredients: -24K Gold: Firms and brightens the look of skin. .-2% Uplevity E-Lift Peptide: Visibly relaxes and lifts expression lines. .-Hyaluronic Acid and Squalane: Help skin feel hydrated and supple and plump with moisture...24K Gold Pure Luxury Lift & Firm Hydra-Gel Eye Patches:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Carrageenan, Butylene Glycol, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Colloidal Gold, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Caffeine, Niacinamide, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Tocopheryl Acetate, Allantoin, Jania Rubens Extract, Adenosine, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Calcium Lactate, Xanthan Gum, Disodium Edta, Peg-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica, Tin Oxide, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Gold (CI 77480), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)...Peptide Skinjectionu2122 Expression Line Hydra-Gel Patches:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Chondrus Crispus Powder, Butylene Glycol, Tetrapeptide-1, Sodium Hyaluronate, Allantoin, Trehalose, Caffeine, Squalane, Niacinamide, Adenosine, Tocopheryl Acetate, Calcium Lactate, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Flower Extract, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Chlorphenesin, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Potassium Chloride, Dextrin, Sodium Phytate, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Xanthan Gum, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Ultramarines (CI 77007), Chromium Hydroxide Green (CI 77289), Phenoxyethanol...Water Drenchu00ae Hyaluronic Cloud Hydra-Gel Eye Patches: .Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Caffeine, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Chondrus Crispus Powder, Glucomannan, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Allantoin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glucose, Althaea Officinalis Leaf Extract, Calcium Chloride, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Ceramide NP, Tocopherol, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Cimicifuga Racemosa Root Extract, Polygonum Multiflorum Root Extract, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Extract, Phellinus Linteus Extract, Angelica Gigas Root Extract, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Paeonia Lactiflora Root Extract, Sophora Angustifolia Root Extract, Hydroxyacetophenone, Chlorphenesin, Ethyl Hexanediol, Propanediol, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Xylitylglucoside, Sucrose, Anhydroxylitol, Disodium EDTA, 1,2-Hexanediol, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Gellan Gum, Glyceryl Caprylate, Xylitol, Betaine, Ethylhexylglycerin, Lecithin, Maltodextrin, Magnesium Aspartate, Zinc Gluconate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Copper Gluconate, Hexylene Glycol, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Norbornanediamine/Resorcinol Diglycidyl Ether Crosspolymer, Tin Oxide, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Mica/CI 77019, Titanium Dioxide/CI 77891, FD&C Blue No. 1/CI 42090, Iron Oxides/CI 77491, Phenoxyethanol. ..The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.24k Gold Pure Luxury Lift and Firm Hydra-Gel Eye Patches and Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Hydra-Gel Eye Patches:.-Use the enclosed spatula to gently lift and separate a delicate gel patch..-Apply onto clean, dry under-eye area..-Repeat on other side..-Relax and enjoy for 10 to 15 minutes..-Discard after use and lightly pat remaining serum into skin..-For external use only...Peptide Skinjection Expression Line Hydra-Gel Patches:.-Use the enclosed spatula to gently lift and separate a delicate gel patch..-To maintain product integrity, hold patch between fingertips and do not pinch with nails when applying..-Carefully place perforated side onto clean, dry skin for no-slip wear..-Use a larger patch to target crowu2019s feet around the outside of the eye. .-Use a smaller patch to target vertical lines between the brows or nose scrunch lines between the eyes. .-Relax and enjoy for 10 to 15 minutes..-Discard patches after use and lightly pat remaining serum into skin. .-For external use only.

reviews.review_text: All three containers were super dried out, which isnu2019t what Iu2019ve come to expect from these products after purchasing them for years. I thought it was just the few layers on top but even after using several layers and leaving the products stored upside down for a few days, there just isnu2019t any serum in them.
Mine didnu2019t have any liquid in it, the patches were dry, especially the gold one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wait for this set every year, itu2019s such a great value. Donu2019t hesitate, just grab it, itu2019s totally worth it. I bought 2 this time!! Self care is so important, super excited to try the new patches!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not one to normally write reviews, but I told my husband I would love to try these someday. He surprised me with them for my birthday, and I'll tell you they are absolutely worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i wish i got this when it was $68 instead of $85. i love these so much. you get a lot of product since if you buy the full sizes, it costs like $60 each. so this is a great value set.
This was an incredible deal, I bought 2 for gifts. 3 full size eye patches in one pack! I'm so glad I purchased when I did. If this comes back in stock I will definitely buy more.
